SELECT s0001d.SALES_ORD_ID,s0001d.SALES_ORD_NO, s0001d.CUST_ID,s0029d.NAME AS CUST_NAME, s0029d.NRIC AS CUST_NRIC, s0013m.CODE_NAME AS STATUS_DESC,s0013m1.CODE_NAME AS USER_TYPE, NVL(p0053s.ACC_DEBT_SUB_TOT_OTSTND,0) AS TOTAL_OUTSTANDING, TO_CHAR(s0001d.CRT_DT,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS CREATED_DATE, ( CASE WHEN s0001d.APP_TYPE_ID = 66 THEN NVL(s0001d.MTH_RENT_AMT,0) - NVL(GRB.REBATE_AMT_PER_INSTLMT,0) ELSE 0 END ) MONTHLY_RENTAL_AMOUNT, s0029d.EMAIL as CUST_EMAIL, s0027d.TEL_M1 AS CUST_MOBILE FROM SAL0001D s0001d LEFT JOIN SAL0029D s0029d ON s0001d.CUST_ID = s0029d.CUST_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0013M s0013m ON s0013m.CODE_ID = s0001d.APP_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0013M s0013m1 ON s0013m1.CODE_ID = s0029d.TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN PAY0053S p0053s ON p0053s.ACC_DEBT_ORD_ID = s0001d.SALES_ORD_ID LEFT JOIN SAL0027D s0027d ON s0001d.CUST_CNT_ID = s0027d.CUST_CNTC_ID LEFT JOIN PAY0286D GRB ON GRB.ORD_ID = s0001d.SALES_ORD_ID AND GRB.STUS_ID = 1 WHERE s0001d.APP_TYPE_ID = 66 AND s0001d.STUS_CODE_ID = 4
AND s0001d.BNDL_ID IS NULL
AND s0001d.BNDL_ID IS NOT NULL
AND s0001d.SALES_ORD_NO = #{salesOrdNo}
SELECT o0001d.MEM_TYPE FROM ORG0001D o0001d LEFT JOIN SYS0047M s0047m ON s0047m.HR_CODE = o0001d.MEM_CODE WHERE s0047m.USER_NAME = #{userName}

SELECT CASE WHEN z.ORD_OTSTND_MTH < 0 THEN 0 ELSE z.ORD_OTSTND_MTH END ORD_OTSTND_MTH, z.* FROM ( SELECT p0333m.PAD_ID, p0333m.PAD_NO, TO_CHAR(p0333m.CRT_DT,'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI:SS AM') AS KEY_IN_DATE, TO_CHAR(p0333m.CRT_DT,'HH24:MI:SS AM') AS KEY_IN_TIMESTAMP, s0038m.NAME AS STATUS_DESC, p0333m.SALES_ORD_NO, s0029d.NAME AS CUST_NAME, s0032m.CODE || '-' || s0032m.RESN_DESC AS RESN_DESC, p0333m.REMARKS, s0047m1.USER_NAME AS CREATOR, s0005m.CODE ||' '|| s0005m.NAME AS USER_BRANCH, TO_CHAR(p0333m.UPT_DT,'DD/MM/YYYY HH24:MI:SS AM') ||','|| (s0047m2.USER_NAME) AS LAST_UPDATED_DATE, p0333m.CUST_CRC_ID, TO_CHAR(s0028d.CUST_CRC_CRT_DT,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS CRC_APPLY_DATE, NVL(FLOOR((SELECT NVL(SUM(p0022d.RENT_AMT) , 0) FROM PAY0022D p0022d WHERE p0022d.RENT_SO_ID = s0001d.SALES_ORD_ID group by p0022d.RENT_SO_ID) / (CASE WHEN p0286d.REBATE_AMT_PER_INSTLMT IS NOT NULL THEN (s0001D.MTH_RENT_AMT - p0286d.REBATE_AMT_PER_INSTLMT) ELSE s0001D.MTH_RENT_AMT END)),0) ORD_OTSTND_MTH, p0333m.CUST_EMAIL AS CUST_EMAIL, p0333m.CUST_PHONE AS CUST_MOBILE FROM PAY0333M p0333m LEFT JOIN SAL0029D s0029d ON p0333m.CUST_ID = s0029d.CUST_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0038M s0038m ON p0333m.STUS_CODE_ID = s0038m.STUS_CODE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0047M s0047m1 ON p0333m.CRT_BY = s0047m1.USER_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0047M s0047m2 ON p0333m.UPT_BY = s0047m2.USER_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0005M s0005m ON p0333m.USER_BRANCH = s0005m.BRNCH_ID LEFT JOIN ORG0001D o0001d ON s0047m1.USER_NAME = o0001d.MEM_CODE LEFT JOIN ORG1001V o1001v ON o1001v.MEM_ID = o0001d.MEM_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0032M s0032m ON s0032m.RESN_ID = p0333m.FAIL_REASON_CODE LEFT JOIN SAL0028D s0028d ON s0028d.CUST_CRC_ID = p0333m.CUST_CRC_ID LEFT JOIN SAL0001D s0001d ON s0001D.SALES_ORD_NO = p0333m.SALES_ORD_NO LEFT JOIN PAY0286D p0286d on p0286d.ORD_ID = s0001d.SALES_ORD_ID AND p0286d.STUS_ID = 1 AND p0286d.CNTRCT_ID = 0 WHERE 1=1
AND p0333m.PAD_NO = TRIM(#{padNo})
AND p0333m.SALES_ORD_NO = TRIM(#{orderNo})
AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(p0333m.CRT_DT, 'DD/MM/YYYY'),'DD/MM/YYYY') BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{requestDateFrom},'DD/MM/YYYY') AND TO_DATE(#{requestDateTo},'DD/MM/YYYY')
AND p0333m.CRT_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{requestDateFrom} || #{requestTimeFrom}, 'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi') AND TO_DATE(#{requestDateTo} || #{requestTimeTo}, 'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi')
AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(s0028d.CUST_CRC_CRT_DT, 'DD/MM/YYYY'),'DD/MM/YYYY') BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{crcRequestDateFrom},'DD/MM/YYYY') AND TO_DATE(#{crcRequestDateTo},'DD/MM/YYYY')
AND s0029d.NAME LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{custName})||'%'
AND s0029d.NRIC = TRIM(#{nricCompanyNo})
AND o1001v.ORG_CODE = TRIM(#{orgCode})
AND o1001v.GRP_CODE = TRIM(#{grpCode})
AND o1001v.DEPT_CODE = TRIM(#{deptCode})
AND p0333m.STUS_CODE_ID in
#{item}
AND s0029d.TYPE_ID in
#{item}
AND s0005m.BRNCH_ID in
#{item}
AND s0005m.REGN_ID in
#{item}
AND s0028d.CARD_TYPE_ID in
#{item}
AND o0001d.MEM_ID = TRIM(#{memId})
AND o0001d.MEM_CODE = TRIM(#{memCode})
AND s0047m1.USER_NAME LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{memTyp})||'%'
) z WHERE 1=1
AND z.ORD_OTSTND_MTH = #{outstandingMth}
ORDER BY z.KEY_IN_DATE DESC

SELECT p0333m.PAD_ID, p0333m.PAD_NO, p0333m.SALES_ORD_NO, custtype.CODE_NAME AS CUST_TYPE, s0029d.NAME, s0029d.NRIC, TO_CHAR(p0333m.CRT_DT,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS CRT_DT, TO_CHAR(s0001d.SALES_DT,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS SALES_DT, s0026m.STK_DESC, ( CASE WHEN s0001d.APP_TYPE_ID = 66 THEN NVL(s0001d.MTH_RENT_AMT,0) - NVL(GRB.REBATE_AMT_PER_INSTLMT,0) ELSE 0 END ) MTH_RENT_AMT, rentalstatus.CODE_NAME AS RENTAL_STATUS, p0333m.FAIL_REASON_CODE, p0333m.REMARKS, p0333m.STUS_CODE_ID, p0333m.IS_THIRD_PARTY_PAYMENT, s0001d.SALES_ORD_ID, p0333m.ATCH_FILE_GROUP_ID, p0333m.THIRD_PARTY_CUST_ID, p0333m.CUST_CRC_ID FROM PAY0333M p0333m LEFT JOIN SAL0029D s0029d ON s0029d.CUST_ID = p0333m.CUST_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0013M custtype ON custtype.CODE_ID = s0029d.TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN SAL0001D s0001d ON s0001d.SALES_ORD_NO = p0333m.SALES_ORD_NO LEFT JOIN SYS0013M rentalstatus ON rentalstatus.CODE_ID = s0001d.APP_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN SAL0002D s0002d ON s0002d.SALES_ORD_ID = s0001d.SALES_ORD_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0026M s0026m ON s0026m.STK_ID = s0002d.ITM_STK_ID LEFT JOIN PAY0286D GRB ON GRB.ORD_ID = s0001d.SALES_ORD_ID AND GRB.STUS_ID = 1 WHERE 1=1 AND p0333m.PAD_ID = #{padId}

SELECT s0028d.CUST_ORI_CRC_NO, s0013m1.CODE_NAME AS CARD_PROVIDER, s0028d.CUST_CRC_OWNER, s0028d.CUST_CRC_EXPR, s0004m.CODE || '-' || s0004m.NAME AS ISSUE_BANK,s0013m2.CODE_NAME AS CARD_TYPE FROM SAL0028D s0028d INNER JOIN SYS0013M s0013m1 ON s0028d.CUST_CRC_TYPE_ID = s0013m1.CODE_ID INNER JOIN SYS0013M s0013m2 ON s0028d.CARD_TYPE_ID = s0013m2.CODE_ID INNER JOIN SYS0004M s0004m ON s0004m.BANK_ID = s0028d.CUST_CRC_BANK_ID WHERE 1=1 AND s0028d.CUST_CRC_ID = #{custCrcId}

SELECT s0071d.ATCH_FILE_ID AS CI_ATCH_FILE_ID, s0071d.ATCH_FILE_NAME AS CI_ATCH_FILE_NAME, s0071d.FILE_SUB_PATH AS CI_FILE_SUB_PATH, s0071d.PHYSICL_FILE_NAME AS CI_PHYSICL_FILE_NAME, s0071d.FILE_EXTSN AS CI_FILE_EXTSN, s0071d.FILE_SIZE AS CI_FILE_SIZE, s0071d.FILE_KEY_SEQ FROM PAY0333M p0333m LEFT JOIN SYS0070M s0070m ON s0070m.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID = p0333m.ATCH_FILE_GROUP_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0071D s0071d ON s0071d.ATCH_FILE_ID = s0070m.ATCH_FILE_ID WHERE 1=1 AND p0333m.PAD_ID = #{padId}
SELECT A.RESN_ID CODE, A.CODE || '-' || A.RESN_DESC AS CODE_NAME FROM SYS0032M A WHERE 1=1 AND A.STUS_CODE_ID = 1 AND A.RESN_TYPE_ID = 6852 ORDER BY A.CODE ASC
SELECT SYS0070M_ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
SELECT SYS0071D_ATCH_FILE_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL atchFileId FROM DUAL
SELECT PAY0333M_PAD_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL padId FROM DUAL
mapper.update: UPDATE PAY0333M SET STUS_CODE_ID = #{statusCodeId}, REMARKS = #{remarks}, FAIL_REASON_CODE = #{rejectReasonCode}, UPT_BY = #{userId}, UPT_DT = SYSDATE, THIRD_PARTY_CUST_ID = #{thirdPartyCustId} WHERE PAD_ID = #{padId}
mapper.select: SELECT s0047m.USER_ID, s0005m.BRNCH_ID AS USER_BRANCH FROM SYS0047M s0047m LEFT JOIN ORG0001D o0001d ON o0001d.MEM_CODE = s0047m.USER_NAME LEFT JOIN SYS0005M s0005m ON s0005m.BRNCH_ID = o0001d.BRNCH WHERE USER_NAME = #{memCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PAY0333M (PAD_ID,PAD_NO,CRT_DT,STUS_CODE_ID,SALES_ORD_NO,CUST_ID, CRT_BY,USER_BRANCH,IS_THIRD_PARTY_PAYMENT,CUST_CRC_ID,SIGN_IMG, ATCH_FILE_GROUP_ID,THIRD_PARTY_CUST_ID,CUST_PHONE, CUST_NEW_PHONE, CUST_EMAIL, CUST_NEW_EMAIL) VALUES (#{padId}, #{padNo}, SYSDATE, 1, #{salesOrdNo}, TO_NUMBER(#{custId}),#{creatorId},TO_NUMBER(#{userBranch}), #{isThirdPartyPaymentCheck},TO_NUMBER(#{newCustCreditCardId}),#{signImg}, TO_NUMBER(#{atchFileGroupId}),#{thirdPartyCustId},#{sms1}, #{sms2},#{email1}, #{email2})
mapper.select: SELECT REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE((SELECT MESSAGE FROM SYS0052M WHERE ID = 'pay.msg.smsAutoDebit'),'{1}', #{monthlyRentalAmount}), '{2}', #{tinyUrl}), '{3}', #{bankIssuer}),'{4}', #{cardEnding}) FROM DUAL
SELECT s0028d.CUST_ORI_CRC_NO, s0004m.CODE AS BANK_ISSUER FROM SAL0028D s0028d INNER JOIN SYS0004M s0004m ON s0004m.BANK_ID = s0028d.CUST_CRC_BANK_ID WHERE s0028d.CUST_CRC_ID = #{newCustCreditCardId}

SELECT s0004m.CODE AS BANK_SHORT_NAME,SUBSTR(s0028d.CUST_ORI_CRC_NO,13,4) AS CARD_LAST_4_DIGIT, p0333m.SALES_ORD_NO, ( CASE WHEN s0001d.APP_TYPE_ID = 66 THEN NVL(s0001d.MTH_RENT_AMT,0) - NVL(GRB.REBATE_AMT_PER_INSTLMT,0) ELSE 0 END ) MONTHLY_RENTAL_AMOUNT FROM PAY0333M p0333m LEFT JOIN SAL0001D s0001d ON p0333m.SALES_ORD_NO = s0001d.SALES_ORD_NO LEFT JOIN SAL0028D s0028d ON p0333m.CUST_CRC_ID = s0028d.CUST_CRC_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0004M s0004m ON s0004m.BANK_ID = s0028d.CUST_CRC_BANK_ID LEFT JOIN PAY0286D GRB ON GRB.ORD_ID = s0001d.SALES_ORD_ID AND GRB.STUS_ID = 1 WHERE p0333m.PAD_ID = #{padId}
SELECT * FROM PAY0333M WHERE PAD_ID = #{padId}
SELECT * FROM SAL0028D WHERE CUST_CRC_ID = #{custCrcId}
SELECT s0074d.* FROM SAL0074D s0074d INNER JOIN SAL0001D s0001d ON s0001d.SALES_ORD_ID = s0074d.SALES_ORD_ID WHERE s0001d.SALES_ORD_NO = #{salesOrdNo} AND SVC_CNTRCT_ID = 0
SELECT USER_ID FROM SYS0047M WHERE USER_NAME = #{userName}

SELECT s0026m.STK_DESC FROM PAY0333M p0333m LEFT JOIN SAL0001D s0001d ON s0001d.SALES_ORD_NO = p0333m.SALES_ORD_NO LEFT JOIN SAL0002D s0002d ON s0002d.SALES_ORD_ID = s0001d.SALES_ORD_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0026M s0026m ON s0026m.STK_ID = s0002d.ITM_STK_ID WHERE p0333m.PAD_ID = #{padId} AND ROWNUM = 1
